Author: unpackedresidents
Text: I met my current boyfriend online 3 and a half years ago. I was overweight at the time from recovery and use skinny photos of myself lol and snap chatted just above the neck. I went full restriction mode and lost like 30 pounds by the time we had our first date. And now weâ€™ve been together ever since and heâ€™s been there for me and my roller coaster of weight, binging, purging, restricting, everything and he still loves me.
